title: We Energies
description: We Energies provides electrical service to areas of Wisconsin and Michigan's Upper Peninsula, and natural gas and steam energy to areas of Wisconsin.
cleaned_text: Delivering safe and reliable energy to Wisconsin and Upper Michigan As the largest renewable energy investor in the state, we know the importance of clean energy. We embrace our responsibility to provide affordable, reliable and clean energy in an environmentally sustainable manner. We work to align our policies and practices with the needs of our key stakeholders, including our customers, communities, employees and investors. Find answers to help [manage power needs](/savings/business/energy-management) of your business.
